ASK_OBJECT:
{
  "QUESTIONS": [
    {
      "Q": "What specific range of impasto thickness (e.g., 2–4 mm) should be applied to the windmill's blades and bicycle's frame to balance Van Gogh’s textured energy with Ghibli’s soft, flowing lines?",
      "DIMENSION": "BRUSHWORK_TECHNIQUE",
      "WHY": "Ensures visible texture in key structural elements without disrupting the soft, emotional flow of the composition",
      "PRIORITY": 1,
      "ANSWER_FORMAT": "range (e.g., 2–4 mm)",
      "DEPENDENCIES": ["windmill blades", "bicycle frame", "Van Gogh’s impasto", "Ghibli’s soft transitions"]
    },
    {
      "Q": "How is the color palette distributed across the windmill, bicycle, and swirling stars—specifically, what percentage of golden yellows, deep violets, and soft blues should each element use to maintain emotional resonance and contrast?",
      "DIMENSION": "COLOR_PALETTE",
      "WHY": "Establishes visual harmony between grounded objects and celestial elements through measurable color allocation",
      "PRIORITY": 2,
      "ANSWER_FORMAT": "distribution by object (e.g., windmill: 40% yellow, 20% violet, 10% blue; bicycle: 50% yellow, 30% violet, 20% blue; stars: 60% yellow, 30% violet, 10% blue)",
      "DEPENDENCIES": ["60% golden yellows", "30% deep violets", "10% soft blues", "emotional resonance", "swirling stars"]
    },
    {
      "Q": "In what compositional role do the windmill, bicycle, and swirling stars function—specifically, how are their spatial relationships arranged (e.g., foreground, mid-ground, background) to create both dynamic energy and emotional flow?",
      "DIMENSION": "COMPOSITION_ROLE",
      "WHY": "Defines the spatial hierarchy that supports both visual movement and emotional narrative continuity",
      "PRIORITY": 3,
      "ANSWER_FORMAT": "spatial layout (e.g., foreground: windmill, mid-ground: bicycle, background: swirling stars)",
      "DEPENDENCIES": ["foreground anchor", "mid-ground dynamic", "background radiating pattern", "spiral and radiating patterns"]
    }
  ],
  "COUNT": 3,
  "NEGATIVE_CHECKS": [
    "Should the windmill or bicycle be rendered with flat, uniform colors or sharp mechanical lines to contradict the soft, expressive style?",
    "Should the swirling stars lack luminosity or contrast to avoid dreamlike emotional tone?",
    "Should the impasto be absent from the windmill or bicycle to eliminate Van Gogh’s influence?"
  ],
  "FOLLOWUP_TRIGGERS": [
    "IF BRUSHWORK specifies impasto > 4 mm THEN ask for texture breakdown by element (e.g., blade vs. frame)",
    "IF COLOR_PALETTE assigns less than 40% golden yellows to any object THEN ask for emotional tone impact and how it affects dreaminess",
    "IF COMPOSITION_ROLE lacks clear foreground/mid-ground/background THEN ask for spatial flow and depth analysis"
  ]
}
